# `/reloadconfig` Command
Reloads configuration files relating to variables, secrets, permissions, etc.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Owner</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>Yes</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### `/reloadconfig`
